description:
A row of small explosive devices wrapped in heavy paper casing. Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes. Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.
  • 1 charge.
name: Chinese Firecracker

description:
A standard Flashlight. Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
  • 8 seconds of use.
name: Flashlight
flavor: "Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

description:
A Flashlight equipped with a special lens cover that adds an orange tint and a little ghost to the beam.
  • 8 Seconds of use.
  • Considerably increases Friendly Ghost in your life.
name: Will O' Wisp

description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip. Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
  • 8 Seconds of use.
  • Slightly decreases the Flashlight battery consumption.
  • Slightly increases accuracy.
name: Sport Flashlight

description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
  • 12 Seconds of use.
  • Slightly reduces accuracy.
  • Moderately increases the beam's visual brightness.
  • Moderately increases the Blindness duration.
name: Utility Flashlight

description:
The bow and shank of a key, vibrating with power. The broken key's power cannot be triggered by itself. Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the broken key's power into various effects.
  • 10 seconds of use.
name: Broken Key

description:
A bent and dull Key that once held great power. The Key's power cannot be triggered by itself. Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Dull Key's remaining power into various effects.
  • 5 seconds of use.
  • Can be consumed to open the Hatch.
name: Dull Key

description:
A tarnished and crooked key, vibrating with ominous power. The key's power cannot be triggered by itself. Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Skeleton Key's power into various effects.
  • 30 seconds of use.
  • Can be consumed to open the Hatch.
name: Skeleton Key

description:
An old piece of parchment made out of a skin-like material. It is rolled and sealed with an uncolored leather string. Holding and channeling the Map unlocks great potential in one's aura reading ability which slowly burns the Map. Generators' auras which you have already encountered are revealed to you for as long as the Map has charges left.
  • 20 seconds of use.
  • Start with 1 generator automatically tracked.
  • Unlocks the ability to track generators within a 8 meter range.
name: Map

description:
A piece of parchment made out of oddly fresh skin. Blood on its edge has yet to dry. It is rolled and sealed with multiple colored ropes and cords. Holding and channelling the Map unlocks great potential in one's aura reading ability which slowly burns up the Map. Objects with auras which you have already encountered are revealed to you for as long as the Map has charges left.
  • 20 seconds of use.
  • Start with 3 objects automatically tracked.
  • Unlocks the ability to track objectives within an 8-meter range.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch within an 8-meter range.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Killer's belongings within an 8-meter range.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the exit gates within an 8-meter range.
name: Rainbow Map
flavor: "It disheartens me. All this unspeakable knowledge and gruelling effort and yet nothing tangible, nothing usable to get out of this nightmare." -Vigo's Journal

description:
A rudimentary aid kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.
  • 16 charges.
  • Moderately increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
name: Camping Aid Kit
flavor: "Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

description:
A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween stickers that has been packed with first-aid equipment.
  • 24 charges.
  • Considerably increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
  • Makes you considerably more visible.
name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
flavor: "Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

description:
A standard first aid kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.
  • 24 charges.
  • Considerably increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
name: First Aid Kit

description:
A sturdy and well organized medical kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.
  • 16 charges.
  • Tremendously increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Tremendously increases the speed that you heal yourself.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
name: Emergency Med-kit
flavor: "There is a cure for almost everything… but not for this."

description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed for emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.
  • 32 charges.
  • Tremendously increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Moderately increases Skill Check success zones.
  • Moderately increases Skill Check bonus zones.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
name: Ranger Med-kit
flavor: "A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

description:
Metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment. Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 charges.
  • Moderately increases repair speed.
  • Slightly decreases Skill Check success zones.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
name: Worn-out Tools

description:
Metal box containing a set of basic tools. Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 20 charges.
  • Moderately increases repair speed.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
  • Slightly increases sabotage speed.
name: Toolbox
flavor: "It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

description:
Metal box with specialized mechanics tools. Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 charges.
  • Considerably increases repair speed.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
  • Slightly decreases sabotage speed.
name: Mechanic's Toolbox

description:
A large metal box containing basic tools and extra mechanical parts. Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 32 charges.
  • Moderately increases repair speed.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
name: Commodious Toolbox

description:
Metal box with highly specialized tools meant for engineering. Most of the tools can still be used by neophytes to make fast repairs or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 charges.
  • Tremendously increases repair speed.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
  • Moderately decreases sabotage speed.
name: Engineer's Toolbox
flavor: "I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralyzed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." –Vigo's Journal

description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools. Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
  • 24 charges.
  • Slightly increases repair speed.
  • Unlocks the sabotage action.
  • Considerably increases sabotage speed.
name: Alex's Toolbox
flavor: "Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

description:
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration. Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes. Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.
  • 1 charge.
name: Winter Party Starter

description:
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration. Detonates into loud bangs, intense light flashes, and playful confetti. Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate our three years together.
  • 1 charge.
name: Third Year Party Starter
flavor:
“Happy Anniversary! Here's to our three years together!"
– The Dead by Daylight Team

description:
A festive Med-kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!
  • 24 charges.
  • Considerably increases the speed that you heal others.
  • Unlocks the self-healing action.
name: Anniversary Med-kit
flavor:
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!"
- The Dead by Daylight Team

description:
A festive Flashlight that explodes with confetti upon blinding a Killer. Surprise!
  • 8 Seconds of use.
name: Anniversary Flashlight
flavor:
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!"
- The Dead by Daylight Team
